name: Insomniatic Snake
description:
WARNING: THE GAME WILL PAUSE IF THE CURSOR CLICK OUTSIDE OF THE GAME SCREEN.

This is your normal game of snake, but in this case there's another mode!

Inspired by the fact things like Netflix, Disney+, Youtube or Instagram have kept me awake throughout quarantine - Ruining my sleep schedule, your mission is to: dodge the incoming distractions as you try to keep your energy low - As if you're anything like me, you've been getting distracted a lot when trying to get to sleep.

Survive for as long as your can, dodging the distractions and making sure you do not hit yourself in some traditional snake game play.

First Phaser game I have made.
